From Barrister Donald Dickson (barr.donald70@yahoo.com)


Dear Sir/Madam,


I have a business i would like you to help me accomplish, i have this
client of mine(Engr. M.A) lthough now late that i worked for but
unfortunately he is now late (dead) as such, most of his properties in my
custody as his personal solicitor are still there. as such i would like you
to help me and stand as his next of kin so that the property (money) could
be forwarded down to you and once this has been successfully accomplished
we share  60-40.


Kindly provide the following information to enable us proceed;


FULL NAMES...............
OCCUPATION................
TELEPHONE.................
ADDRESS...................
AGE......................;


I shall be waiting to hear from you.


Cheers!!!
Donald

messages.body:
July 24th


Attention Nigel Ryan-Schama,


 I am Barrister Donald Dickson,a personal attorney to Engineer Martin
Albert who was a business tycoon here in united Kingdom. when my client was
alive, he deposited the sum of (GBP:25M)Twenty-five million British pounds
sterlings to his business account which i have a copy of deposit
certificate with me and other related documentation.


My client was in involve in a gasty motor accident here in London, three
years ago, with his wife and children and since then i have been looking
for the relative so that i can tender all my client documents to them.but
all proved none and abortive, Now bank is trying to confiscate my client
fund with them that is why i am seeking your hand to act as next of kin to
my late client.


All I needed from you is to be trust worthy, honest to me so that at the
end of the day, when we finally transfer the total sum into your bank
account, i will plan to come over to your country so that we can share it
and i can even invest my own share of the money there in your country.


I have this believe that in a business like this, there will be involvement
of expenses, which i am assuring you that whatever expenses that came in
along this process, i would want us to share it together and set off the
expenses. You have 40% while i have 60% but if it is not okay by you there
is still a way out.


If really you accept to work with me with all your heart, i am promising
you that you will have nothing to regret about it. on your next mail i will
send a deposit certificate to you.


Thanks for your understanding,


Regards,
Donald

July 29th


Attention Nigel Ryan-Schama,


Thank you once again on your urgent respond; I must confess that I will be
glad to work with you as my partner in this transaction if only you will be
honest and trustworthy which is the most important thing.


Like I said earlier, I will do anything within my reach to make sure
everything is been put in place, all I needed from you is your total
support both moral and financial support as to make this dream come true.


Well, asking of how much it will cost, is what I would tell you that I
don.t know yet but I believe the more we go further we will be able to know
how much it will cost for the process, all I know for now is that there
will be a documents covering you as the next of kin to my late client which
I will list them below and if you permit me to know the cost of all the
documents I will proceed to the British High Court to know how much those
documents worth.


If you are ready to work with me, I will start by going to the British High
Court tomorrow to know what the cost of these documents is and after that I
will send a copy of deposit certificate to you.


1, CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE
2, FUND ORIGIN CERTIFICATE
3, AFFIDAVIT OF CLAIM
4, DRUG CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE
5, ANTI- TERRORIST CERTIFICATE
6, INTERNATIONAL TRANSFER PERMITS CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE


This is all the documents we need to process the fund transfer into your
nominated bank account.


I have accepted to offer you 60% since you have assured me that you will be
taking care of 60% expenses that we may encounter during this process.


Your contact information is also needed such as, Home address and telephone
number and international passport.


I will be looking forward to read again from you,


Regards,
Donald

messages.body:
July 31st


Yo Dickson


 All of a sudden I'm worried.


Real worried.


I'm not worried about these expenses, I understand these things cost
moneyand I have some funds put aside which I can use for this.


No my friend, what I am worried about is YOU !.


You seem to be un-able to calculate simple mathematical sums.


Your addition is correct, those items do indeed sum to £4,020.


But your allocation of my share is woefully incorrect.


60% of £4,020 is NOT £3,200.


 Not only that, but you are pestering me for information you already have
!!!


You know my name, I sign all my messages to you with my full name !


How can you ask that of me ?


 As our relationship is still young, and I still hope to bring this
transaction to a 100% successful conclusion, I am willing to overlook these
blunders for now.


 But hear me, DO NOT repeat them, otherwise the deal is off !


NEVER miscalculate numbers again.


NEVER ask me for information that I have already given you.


 When you have correctly calculated 60% of £4,020, get back to me, OK ?


 In the meantime, here are the other details you asked for.


Home address - xxxx Pacific Heights Boulevard, Seattle, USA (I have a small
office here)


Phone number - I no longer use a phone, I have been deaf since having a
stroke 6 years ago.


International passport / drivers licences - what do you mean by this ? How
can I send these to you by e-mail ? Rest assured I possess both of them.


 When it comes to visiting England, the timing will be driven by my
sister's 90th birthday celebrations later this year. I don't know the exact
date of the celebrations yet, but when I do I'll let you know.

Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
August 7th


Yo Dickson !


 I am very sorry, I had a TERRIBLE day yesterday ! You remember I told you
that it was a long and difficult journey to the nearest Western Union ?
Well I set off yesterday morning, bright and early. I took the cash with
me, so I was all set to send the money to you. My car was attacked by a
moose on the way, which delayed me quite a bit. Don't worry, I wasn't
injured, this kind of thing is quite common here, but it's still very
annoying and it did break the windshield which I'll have to get fixed in
the next month or so before the real rain sets in. 


ANYWAY, I got to the
Western Union, and told the guy I wanted to pay £2,412 to my friend in
London, UK. I had $3,000 with me, which I thought would be enough, to pay
you and also pay WU's charges. But I had MISCALCULATED ! You only get about
60pence to the buck at the moment, and I think WU's rate is a little worse
than that. I thought it was the other way round, 60 cents to the pound, but
I was mistaken. Anyway, it was going to cost me over $4,000 to pay you
£2,412, and I just didn't have that much cash on me ! 


I am SO SORRY for
this miscalculation and I hope it does not delay our transaction. Please
don't misunderstand me, it's not a problem to pay you $4,000 or even
$5,000, I have plenty of cash in the house, but I just didn't have it on me
at the time. The bank was closed by then, and the only thing I could do was
go home again after making a totally wasted journey ! I did think about
paying you just the $3,000 I had on me, which would have worked out at
maybe £1,800, less WU's charges, I'm not sure of the exact amount, but I
was worried that you might misunderstand this and be offended that I was
paying you less than the full amount. So I didn't. And then, to cap it all,
on the way home, I was pulled over for speeding and got a ticket ! Can you
believe my luck ????


 ANYWAY partner, I hope you can forgive this.


 It will be Friday now before I can get back into town (I'm sorry, I can't
go today or tomorrow). If you need to pay these fees urgently, please do so
and I will get my share over to you ASAP. OR, can you accept a bank
transfer ? I could do a bank transfer to you right now. Can you give me the
details please if you want to do that ?

Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

Supposedly on the headed paper of the barrister's chambers, which are apparently located at 3rd floor, xxx Hedgamans Essex London, with a cellphone number for a "direct line". This address is nonsense (parts of outer London are in Essex, in which case you might possibly write London, Essex, but never Essex, London).

But if you Google this address, it suggests xxx Hedgemans Road, Dagenham, or xxx Hedgemans Way, Barking. These are actually only a few yards away from each other, and both are in outer London, and also in Essex. And a quick look on Google Maps shows that this is a strange place for barrister's chambers - it's a residential area, and one where there are very many more or less identical houses. Both of these addresses are two stories high, as are most of the houses in this area, no 3rd floor offices. Is this where the barrister really lives ? Or are they addresses that he has picked on at random ? We may never know.

Yo Dickson ! How's it going ? Thank you so much for the reminder that today
is Monday, that was helpful indeed.

out for the evening and hasn't come home yet ? Or do you mean she's dead ?

your life and help fill the void left by your departed Mrs. I have to say
my own kids have not done that for me. They are worthless ingrates and
every time I look on their idiotic faces I curse the day Mrs Ryan-Schama
packed her bags, hopped on the train to Poughkeepsie and left me alone to
bring them up. How could she do that to me ? If only she had waited another

transaction, get hold of the money, and make sure my kids never see a cent
of it !

October 25th


Dear Mr Dickson.


My name is Frankelle Baum, I'm with the FIB, I'm an executive in the
department of internet security.


As you know the US Government monitors all email traffic around the world,
and we have followed your correspondence with Mr RyanSchama of Seattle.


Oct 8th you wrote Mr RyanSchama telling him you had forwarded details of
his terrorist activities to the FBI.


I write to inform you we have not received any correspondence from you
concerning Mr RyanSchama's terrorist activities.


Mr RyanSchama is known to us but not for terrorist reasons.


If you have evidence of terrorist activity that Mr RyanSchama is engaged
in, please report it to my office immediately.


Please be aware that it is a federal offence to withhold evidence of
terrorist activity.


I know you're in England but we have a strong extradition treaty with the
English government and if you withhold evidence we will not hesitate to
extradite you to Washington or Guantanamo Bay for special interview.


I strongly advise you to co-operate with my office, and we are able to pay
rewards for evidence leading to successful prosecution of terrorists.


Frankelle Baum
Executive Officer
Federal Investigation Bureau
Suite 41
9 Lower Da Crux Avenue
Washington DC

messages.body:
November 3rd


Dear Extradition Candidate


Be advised that this office does not negotiate with foreign nationals such
as yourself who fail to co-operate with the justice system, except as part
of court-sanctioned plea bargaining protocols, pursuant to section 13 of
the 2002 Homeland Defence Act.


If you wish to enter a plea bargain, please clarify your requirements.


 This office does not issue phone numbers, to prevent incoming calls of a
fraudulent nature.


We will call you when we want to speak with you.


 Extradition proceedings will commence against you November 11 if you
continue to fail to co-operate, with initial rendition to the Guantanamo
Bay facility.


Frankelle Baum
Executive Officer
Federal Investigation Bureau
Suite 41
9 Lower Da Crux Avenue
Washington DC
